GK16visa06cu:688_1: lakṣmaṇo 'yam” iti sītālakṣmaṇayoḥ praveśaṃ sūcayitvā niṣkāntena svaprayogamatiśayāna
GK16visa06cu:696: eva prayogaḥ sūcita iti---sītālakṣmaṇayoḥ praveśarūpo 'nyaḥ prayogaḥ sūcita ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa06cu:762: (lo, u) śrutaṃ kasyāpi sammukhīnasya mukhāditivṛttaṃ prakṛtagranthābhidheyam /

GK16visa06cu:794: tenāsya āmukhe itivṛtte ca sambhava ityagre vyaktībhaviṣyati /

GK16visa06cu:816: alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi ! vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśametam /
GK16visa06cu:817: calitamapi niroddhuṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe ! kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi” //
GK16visa06cu:823: tadveśena sāgarikā āyāsyatīti kṛtasaṅkete rājñi sthite tajjñātvā vāsavadattaiva sāgarikāyā āgamanāt pūrvamāgatya saṅketabhgaṃ kṛtvā rājanāṃ hrepayitvāṃ gatā /
GK16visa06cu:825: tatastadveśā sāgarikā āgatya rājānamanāsādya nirvadāllatāpāśenātmānaṃ baddhvā marttumudyatā /
GK16visa06cu:827: pathi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattaivāyaṃ mriyata iti jñātvā pāśaṃ mocayan sāgarikāyā uktyā sāgarikeyamiti jñātvā guṇavatīmuddeśyaphalasampattimāptavān /
GK16visa06cu:828: atra vāsavadattāmaraṇarūpe 'nyasminnarthe cintite āgantukena latāpāśena vāsavadattāmaraṇacihnadyaṅkitamriyamāṇasāgarikārūpārthaprayoga iti patākasthānasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:841: atra raktādīnāṃ rudhiraśarīrārthahetukaśleṣavaśena bījārthapratipādanānnetṛmaṅgalapratipattau satyāṃ dvitāyaṃ patākāsthānam /
GK16visa06cu:848: atrānuraktādyarthe cintite śabdarūpatalliṅgo 'nyo rudhirādyartha āgantukena śabdena prayogāt patākasthānasāmānyalakṣaṇasattvam /
GK16visa06cu:849: idaṃ patākāsthānamāmukhāntargataṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca vṛttāntargataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:858: sambandhayogyena iti uktavākyānvayaḥ savinayamityatra vinayo viśeṣaṇa nayaḥ niścayaḥ tad vyācaṣṭe--viśeṣeti /
GK16visa06cu:862: savinayaṃ viśeṣaniścayaprāptyā sahitaṃ saṃpādyate yattattṛtīyaṃ patākāsthānam /
GK16visa06cu:866: rājā--āḥ ! kiṃ pralapasi ? kañcukī--(sabhayam) deva ! nanu bravīmi /
GK16visa06cu:868: rājā-dhig vṛddhāpasada ! ko 'yamadya te vyāmohaḥ ? kañcukī-deva ! na vyāmohaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:874: (vi, bha) bagnamiti--- bhagnaṃ bhīmeva marutā bhavato rathaketanam /
GK16visa06cu:876: iti kañcukinā vaktavye sambhramāt khaṇḍaśa uktam /
GK16visa06cu:877: duryodhanorubhaṅgarūpārthopakṣepakaṃ bhīmenetyatra bhīmasenarūpeṇa svānuṣṭhānayogyena ketanabhaṅgatiriktabhiprāyayuktena duryodhanasya pratyuttareṇepetam /
GK16visa06cu:884: atra ketubhaṅgarūpe 'nyasmin cintite ūrubhaṅgarūpārthaprayoga āgantukena śliṣṭaśabdenetyataḥ patākāsthānasāmānyalakṣaṇasattvam /
GK16visa06cu:897: adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham” //
GK16visa06cu:901: uddāmeti---rājñā parigṛhītāṃ mādhavīlatāmakālakusumitāṃ vāsavadattayāḥ parājayaśaṃsinīṃ tasyaiva darśayato rājña uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:903: imāmudyānalatāṃ paśyannahaṃ devyā vāsavadattāyā mukhaṃ kopavipāṭaladyutiṃ kariṣyāmītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:910: śvasanasya vahirvāyorniḥ śvāsasya codramāt āyāsaṃ vyākulatāṃ khedañca ātanvatīṃ kurvatīm /
GK16visa06cu:912: (lo, ḷ) uddāmeti---udratā kalikā koraka utkaṇṭhā ca /
GK16visa06cu:920: rājñā sāgarikādarśanāt vāsavadattāyāḥ bhāvī kopo mukhyātayā pratipādya iti pradhānaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visa06cu:921: atra kusumilatādarśanād bhāvini kope cintite sāgarikādarśanāt tatkopa āgantukena śliṣṭaśabdena pratipāditaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:924: etāni catvāri patākāsthānāni kvacinmaṅgalārthaṃ kvacidamaṅgalārthaṃ sarvasandhiṣu bhavanti /
GK16visa06cu:926: yatpunaḥ kenaciduktam--“mukhasandhimārabhya sandhicatuṣṭaye krameṇa bhavanti” iti /
GK16visa06cu:927: tadanye na manyante, eṣāmatyantamupādeyānāmaniyamena sarvatrāpi sarveṣāmapi bhavituṃ yuktatvāt /
GK16visa06cu:931: prathame marttu pravṛttavāsavadattājñānādbhilaṣitasāgarikāprāpteruddāmotkalikāmityatra bhāvinyāḥ sāgarikāprāpteśca bodhanāt maṅgalārthatā /
GK16visa06cu:932: raktaprasādhitetyādau kurūṇāṃ maraṇasya bhagnaṃ bhīmenetyādau duryodhanorubhaṅgasya ca bodhanāt teṣāmamaṅgalārthatā /
GK16visa06cu:953: vīracarite tu vālī rāmavadhārthamāgato rāmeṇa hata ityanyathā kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:955: yā ca syādvarṣaparyantaṃ kathā dinadvayādijā // VisSd_6.51 //
GK16visa06cu:967: ekadinamātrasya ca kathāyā aṅkadarśanīyatvena dinadvayādikathāyāḥ kathaṃ parigrahaḥ kathāvistāro vā rasavinghahetutvātkathamaṅke darśanīya ityata āhṛaṅkeṣviti /
GK16visa06cu:975: pūrvatra varṣaparyantatvamiha tu varṣādūrddhvatvamiti bhedānna paunaruktyam /
GK16visa06cu:983: nanu ekavarṣakathaiva yadyarthopakṣepeṇa vācyā tadūrddhvaṃ kathā kiṃ parityājyā ityata āha---varṣāditi /
GK16visa06cu:987: tatsarvaṃ kartavyaṃ varṣādūrdhvaṃ na tu kadācit” //
GK16visa06cu:992: sarvaṃ māsasañcitaṃ varṣasañcitaṃ vāpi kāryaṃ kṛtyam aṅkacchede 'pi karttavyam /
GK16visa06cu:995: evaṃ ca caturdaśavarṣavyāpinyapi rāmavanavāse ye ye virādhavadhādayaḥ kathāṃ--śāste te varṣavarṣāvayavadinayugmādīnāmekatamena sūcanīyā na viruddhāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1011: śuddhaḥ syātsa tu saṃkīrṇo nīcamadhyamakalpitaḥ // VisSd_6.56 //
GK16visa06cu:1040: (lo, ā) nīcapātraprayojita ityatra nīcatvaṃ hi asaṃskṛtabhāṣitvādeva /
GK16visa06cu:1054: bho bho vaimānikāḥ, pravartantāṃ raṅgamaṅgalāni” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:1055: “rāmeṇa paraśurāmo jitaḥ” iti nepathye pātraiḥ sūcitam /
GK16visa06cu:1062: aṅkānte pātraiḥ sūcitor'thādaparaḥ aṅkaḥ yadavatarati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1069: yathā---abhijñāne pañcamāṅke pātraiḥ sūcitaḥ ṣaṣṭhāṅkastadaṅkasyāṅgaviśeṣa ivāvatīrṇaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1077: aṅkāvatāre tadaṅkamātrasūcanam aṅkamukhe tu samastāṅkasūcaneti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1081: yathā---mālatīmādhave prathamāṅkādau kāmandakyavalokite bhūrivasuprabhṛtīnāṃ bhāvibhūmikānāṃ parikṣiptakathāprabandhasya ca prasaṅgātsaṃniveśaṃ sūcitavatyau /
GK16visa06cu:1093: pūrvalakṣaṇe pūrvapraviṣṭapātraiḥ samastāṅkārthasūcanamatra tu aṅkāntaḥ praviṣṭapātraistaduttarāṅkārthamātrasūcanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1101: 'ityatra pūrvāṅkānta eva praviṣṭena sumāntrapātreṇa śatānandajanakakathāvicchede uttarāṅkamukhasūcanādaṅkāsyam” iti /
GK16visa06cu:1106: (vi, cha) idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dhanikamata eva ityāha---etacceti /
GK16visa06cu:1121: taṃ parityajyāmukhānantaraṃ svecchācārī bhīta evāsmi bhartturiti nīrasaṃsvabhayaṃ yaugandharāyaṇena darśitam /
GK16visa06cu:1125: yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlādeva pravartate // VisSd_6.62 //
GK16visa06cu:1129: (vi, jha) ādāvaṅkasya darśita iti yaduktaṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayati---yadātviti /
GK16visa06cu:1132: āmukhena yaḥ pātrasyākṣepaḥ tamāśritya pravṛtta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1134: tatra hi mūlādevānasūyayā pravarttitaḥ sa rasa eva śakuntalāyā virahaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1143: tena nāyakavadhaḥ kvāpi na varṇanīyaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1156: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca // VisSd_6.64 //
GK16visa06cu:1176: yathā---ratnāvalyāmanaṅgapūjāparisamāptau kathārthavicchede sati “udayansyendorivodvīkṣate” iti sāgarikā śrutvā “(saharṣam)
GK16visa06cu:1182: kathaṃ sa eva udayananarendra iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1184: avāntarārthe sāgarikavirahe udayananṛpatvena jñānāt hi tasya virahavarṇanapravṛtyācchedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1185: kintu tatsūcakaṃ vinaiva nṛpadarśanarūpakāraṇasattvāt pravarttate ityato 'ṅkāvatārādibhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1190: ratnāvalyāmeva dvitīyabinduryathā devīgamanānantaramevāntarāvicchede vidūṣakaṃ prati rājñā vacanam /
GK16visa06cu:1191: dhiṅamūrkha ! alaṃ parihāsena ābhijātyena gūḍho devyāstvayā na lakṣitaḥ kopaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1192: tathā hi devīmeva prasādayituṃ gacchāva iti /
GK16visa06cu:1203: garbhe sandhau vimarśe vā nirvāhastasya jāyate /
GK16visa06cu:1208: tathā cānāyakasya sugrīvāderapi svakīyarājyalābhādiphalāntaraṃ yattadapi patākāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1209: apiśabdāt nāyakasya rāmasya setubandhādi phalāntaramapi patākāntaramiti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:1211: garbhe vimarṣe vā sandhau ityubhayatra sandhāvityasyānvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1216: yattu muninoktam--“ā gārbhādvā vimarśādvā patākā vinivartate” //
GK16visa06cu:1226: anāyakaphalarūpā patākaiva āgarbhād āvimarṣād vā nivarttate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1229: anāyakasya phalāntararūpāyā eva patākāyā āgarbhād vā āvimarśādvā nivṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1231: prāsaṅgikaṃ pradeśasthaṃ caritaṃ prakarī matā // VisSd_6.68 //
GK16visa06cu:1248: naca rāvaṇasyānāyakatvāt phalaṃ tatphalakatvāt asya patākatvaprasaktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa06cu:1263: avasthāḥ pañca kāryasya prārabdhasya phalārthibhiḥ // VisSd_6.70 //
GK16visa06cu:1267: (vi, pha) asya kāryyasya pañcāvasthā āha---avasthā iti /
GK16visa06cu:1282: yathā ratnāvalyām---“tahavi ṇa atthi aṇyo daṃsaṇa uvāo tti jadhā tadhā ālihia jadhāsamīhidaṃ karaissam” /
GK16visa06cu:1286: tathāpi nāstyanyo darśanopāya itinyathā tathā ālikhya yathāsamīhitaṃ kariṣyamīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1304: yathā---ratnāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke veṣaparivartanābhisaraṇādeḥ saṅgamopāyādvāsavadattālakṣaṇāpāyaśaṅkayā cānirdhāritaikāntasaṅgamarūpaphalaprāptiḥ prāptyaśā /
GK16visa06cu:1321: nacāsya kathaṃ kāryāvasthātvaṃ sāgarikāsaṅgamanarūpakāryasya tenāniṣpādanāt iti vācyam /
GK16visa06cu:1358: mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśa upasaṃhṛtiḥ // VisSd_6.75 //
GK16visa06cu:1390: prathame 'ṅke iti tatra kandarpapūjāyāṃ sāgarikāyā rājño darśanaṃ vidhinā ānīya ghaṭitaṃ bījam /
GK16visa06cu:1395: lakṣyālakṣya ivodbhedo yatra pratimukhaṃ ca tat /
GK16visa06cu:1401_1: susaṃgatā--vidūṣakābhyāṃ jñāyamānatayā kiṃcillakṣyasya vāsavadattayā citra phalakavṛttāntena
GK16visa06cu:1405: sāgarikālikhitena rājñā svena ca yuktaṃ citraphalakaṃ rājñā prāptam /
GK16visa06cu:1406: vasantakahastāt skhalitaṃ vāsavadattayā tat prāpya tatra likhitasya tadubhayānurāgabījanamunnītam /
GK16visa06cu:1407: tādṛśo bhedarūpaḥ pratimukhasandhiśca vāsavadattāyāmāgatāyāṃ susaṅgatāvasantakayorvyāpārarūpo yatnasahitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1420: adakkhiṇā dāṇi si tumaṃ jā evaṃ bhaṭṭiṇā hattheṇa gāhidā vi kovaṃ ṇa muñcasi” ityādau samudbhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1422: tṛtīye 'ṅke---“tadvārtānveṣaṇāya gataḥ kathaṃ cirayati vasantakaḥ” ityanveṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:1424: kosambīrajjalambheṇāvi ṇa tādiso piavaassassa paritoso jādiso mama saāsādo piyavaaṇaṃ suṇia bhavassadi” ityādāvudbhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1432: yā evaṃ bhartrā haste gṛhītāpi kopaṃ na muñcasīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1435: bho bhoḥ kauśāmbīrājyalābhenāpina tādṛśaḥ priyavayasyasya paritoṣaḥ yādṛśo mama sakāśāt priyavacanaṃ śrutvā bhaviṣyatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1440: latāpāśakaraṇāddhi rājñaḥ sāgarikādarśanaṃ tato garbhasandheḥ prāptyāśāyogarūpāvasthāyogaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1444: yā evaṃ bhartrāhaste 'pi gṛhītāpi kopaṃ na muñcasi /
GK16visa06cu:1446: kauśāmbīrājyalābhenāpi na tādṛśaḥ priyavayasyasya paritoṣaḥ yādṛśaṃ mama sakāśāt priyavacanaṃ śrutvā bhaviṣyati /
GK16visa06cu:1450: śāpādyaiḥ sāntarāyaśca sa vimarśa iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1459: jaivi gandhavveṇa vivāheṇa ṇibbuttakallāṇā piasahī sauntalā aṇurūvabhattubhāiṇī saṃvutteti nivvudaṃ me hiaam,
GK16visa06cu:1460: taha vi ettiaṃ cintaṇijjam” ityata ārabhya saptamāṅkopakṣiptācchakuntalāpratyabhijñānātprāgarthasañcayaḥ śakuntalāvismaraṇarūpavinghāliṅgitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1468: “priyaṃvade ! yadyapi gāndharveṇa vivāhena nivṛttakalyāṇā priyasakhī śakuntalā anurūpabharttṛgāminī saṃvṛttā iti nirvṛtaṃ mama hṛdayam“iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1470: tatpūrvaṃ durvāsasaḥ śāpena rājñaḥ śakuntalāsamāgamarūpapradhānaphalasya upāyaḥ pratiruddhaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1473: smāriṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhaito 'pi san kathāṃ pramattaḥ prathamoditāmiva /
GK16visa06cu:1479: priyaṃvade yadyapi gāndharveṇa vidhinā nivṛttakalyāṇā priyasakhī śakuntalā anurūpabharttṛgāminī saṃvṛtteti nivṛttaṃ me hṛdayam /
GK16visa06cu:1490: ayaṃ khalu bhīmaseno duryodhanakṣatajāruṇīkṛtasarvaśarīro durlakṣyavyaktiḥ” ityādinā draupadīkeśasaṃyamanādimukhasandhyādibījānāṃ nijanijasthānopakṣiptānāmekārthayojanam /
GK16visa06cu:1505: udbhadaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda etānyaṅgāni vai mukhe // VisSd_6.82 //
GK16visa06cu:1514: lābhāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya /
GK16visa06cu:1515: ākṛṣya pāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśān svasthā bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ //
GK16visa06cu:1519: lākṣāgṛhānaleti---“svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ“iti sūtradhārasyoktiṃ śrutvā praviṣṭasya bhīmasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:1520: lākṣetyādibhiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca ye 'smān prahṛtya dhārtarāṣṭrā mayi jīvati sati svasthā bhavanti ? iti /
GK16visa06cu:1522: lākṣetyādinā prāṇeṣu prahārapraveśena vittanicayeṣu ca prahāraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1528: pravṛddhaṃ yadvairaṃ mama khalu śisoreva kurubhir- na tatrāryo heturna bhavati kirīṭī na ca yuvām /
GK16visa06cu:1529: jarāsaṃdhasyoraḥ sthalamiva virūḍhaṃ punarapi krudhā bhīmaḥ sandhiṃ vighaṭayati yūyaṃ ghaṭayata //
GK16visa06cu:1534: śiśoreveti---mama yauvanāpekṣāpi tairna kṛtā, śiśukāla eva viṣadānāt /
GK16visa06cu:1550: he devi draupadi ! tava kacān keśān veṇībaddhān kurvan bhīma uttaṃsayiṣyati /
GK16visa06cu:1552: bhīmaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? suyodhanasya styānāvanaddhena pravṛddhasambaddhena ghanaśoṇitena śoṇapāṇiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1554: cañcatā calatā bhujena bhramitayā gadayābhighātena saṃcūrṇitamūruyugalaṃ yasya tādṛśasya /
GK16visa06cu:1557: (lo, ai) styāneti-styānaḥ san avanaddhaḥ dṛḍhībhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1561: parinyāsastato 'pi naścayāpattirūpatayā parito hṛdaye nyasanam, ityeṣāṃ bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1562: etāni cāṅgāni uktenaiva paurvāparyeṇa bhavanti, aṅgāntarāṇi tvanyathāpi /
GK16visa06cu:1566: tato 'pi naścayāpattirūpatayā iti niścayasya bhāvikarttavyaniścayasyāpattirapādānaṃ bodhanamiti yāvat /
GK16visa06cu:1570: yathā tatraiva---“draupadī--ṇādha, kiṃ dukkaraṃ tue parikuvideṇa” /
GK16visa06cu:1571: yathā vā mama candrakalāyāṃ candrakalāvarṇane--seyam, “tāruṇyasyavilāsaḥ---” ityādi (139 pṛ.) /
GK16visa06cu:1572: yattu śakuntalādiṣu “grīvābhaṅgābhirāmam---” ityādi mṛgādiguṇavarṇanaṃ tadvījārthasambandhābhāvānna saṃdhyaṅgam /
GK16visa06cu:1578: kiṃ duṣkaraṃ tvayā kupitena iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1581: atra vilāsahāsapade tajjanakapare sāropayā lakṣaṇayā prayukte /
GK16visa06cu:1594: yathā--veṇyāṃ sahādevo bhīmaṃ prati ārya ! kiṃ mahārājasaṃdeśo 'yamavyutpanna evāryeṇa gṛhītaḥ” ityataḥ prabhṛti yāvadbhīmavacanam /
GK16visa06cu:1599: yathā tatraiva---“mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt---” ityādi (284 pṛ.)
GK16visa06cu:1601: ṇādha, assudapuvvaṃ kkhu edaṃ vaaṇam, tā puṇo puṇo bhaṇa” /
GK16visa06cu:1606: nātha ! aśrutapūrvaṃ khalu īdṛśaṃ vacanam, tatpunaḥ punarbhaṇa iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:1615: bho bho drupadavirāṭavṛṣṇyandhaka sahadevaprabhṛtayaḥ ! asmadakṣauhiṇīpatayaḥ kauravacamūpradhānayodhāśca śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ---
GK16visa06cu:1616: yatsatyavratabhaṅgabhīrumanasā yatnena mandīkṛtaṃ yadvismartumapīhitaṃ śamavatā śānti kulasyecchatā /
GK16visa06cu:1617: taddyūtāraṇisaṃbhṛtaṃ nṛpasutākeśāmbarākarṣaṇaiḥ krodhajyotiridaṃ mahatkuruvane yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ jṛmbhate” //
GK16visa06cu:1621: yat yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ krodhajyoti iti sarvatra viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:1623: dyūtarūpāyāmaraṇyāṃ manthanakāṣṭhe nṛpasutāyā drupadasutāyā draupadyāḥ keśasyāmbarasya cākarṣaṇāt sambhṛtakrodhajyotiragniḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1626: atra “svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati--” ityādi bījasya pradhānanāyakābhimatatvena samyagahitatvātsamādhānam /
GK16visa06cu:1636: yathā vā mama prabhāvatyām--“nayanayugāsecanakam-” ityādi (236 pṛ.) /

GK16visa06cu:2307: tīrṇe bhīṣmamahodadhau kathamapi droṇānale nivṛte karṇāśīviṣabhogini praśamite śalye ca yāte divam /
GK16visa06cu:2308: bhīmena priyasāhasena rabhāsādalpāvaśeṣe jaye sarva jīvitasaṃśayaṃ vayamamī vācā samāropitāḥ //
GK16visa06cu:2317: alpāvaśeṣe jaye priyasāhasena bhīmena sarve vayaṃ jīvitasaṃśayaṃ prāpitā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2325: yathā veṇyām---“pāñcālakaḥ--ahaṃ devena cakrapāṇinā sahitaḥ---” ityupakramya kṛtaṃ sandehena /
GK16visa06cu:2326: pūryantāṃ salilena ratnakalaśā rājyābhiṣekāya te kṛṣṇātyantacirojjhite tu kabarībandhe karotu kṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2327: rāme śātakuṭhārabhāsvarakare kṣatradrumocchedini kramadhāndhe ca vṛkodare paripatatyājau kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ” //
GK16visa06cu:2334: gadāyuddhe bhīmajayajijñāsārthaṃ kṛṣṇena prahitasya pāñcālakasya yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:2336: atyantacirojjhite 'pi kabarībandhe kṛṣṇā draupadī kṣaṇamutsavaṃ karotu ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2339: śātakuṭhāreṇa bhāsurakare kṣatrarūpadrumocchedini rāme paraśurāme vṛkodare ca krodhāndhe ājau paripatati gacchati sati kuto jayasaṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2343: nāhaṃ rakṣo na bhūto ripurudhirajalāhlāditāṅgaḥ prakāmaṃ nistīrṇorupratijñājalanidhigahanaḥ krodhanaḥ kṣatriyo 'smi /
GK16visa06cu:2344: bho bho rājanyavīrāḥ ! samaraśikhiśikhābhuktaśeṣāḥ ! kṛtaṃ va--
GK16visa06cu:2356: krodhanaḥsan ripurudhirajalena kleditāṅgaḥ prīṇitāṅgaḥ san prakāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nistīrṇaḥ mahāpratijñārūpe jalanidhitvaṃ vanatvaṃ ca rūpitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2357: bho bhoḥ samararūpāgniśikhayā bhuktaśeṣā rājanyavīrāḥ ! vo yuṣmākamanena āsena kṛtamalam /
GK16visa06cu:2368: apriyāṇi karotveṣa vācā śakto na karmaṇā /
GK16visa06cu:2397: (vi, ḍa) kauravaśataṃ hatvā bhavati yajñetyādikaṃ bhīmasyoktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2400: mukhe prathamataḥ kṣiptamupanyastaṃ pratijñayā bodhitaṃ bījaṃ pratijñātārtharūpaṃ punarupagataṃ jñāpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2405: saṃyamayāmi tāvadanena suyodhanaśoṇitokṣitena pāṇinā pāñcālyā duḥśāsanāvakṛṣṭaṃ keśahastam /
GK16visa06cu:2406: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ--gacchatu bhavān, anubhavatu tapasvinī veṇīsaṃhāram” iti /
GK16visa06cu:2418: yathā tatraiva---bhīmaḥ--pāñcāli ! na khalu mayi jīvati saharṃttavyā duḥśāsanavilulitā veṇirātmapāṇibhyām /
GK16visa06cu:2430: yathā tatraiva, bhīmaḥ--deva ajātaśatro ! adyāpi duryodhanahatakaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2432: bhūmau kṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ nihatamidamasṛkcandanābhaṃ nijāṅge takṣmīrārye niṣaktā caturudadhipayaḥ sīmayā sārddhamurvyā /
GK16visa06cu:2433: bhṛtyā mitrāṇi yodhāḥ kurukulamanujā dagdhametadraṇāgnau nāmaikaṃ yadbravīṣi kṣitipa ! tadadhunā dhārttarāṣṭasya śeṣam //
GK16visa06cu:2439: tasya durātmano duryyodhanasya śarīraṃ mayā bhūmau kṣiptaṃ pātitam /
GK16visa06cu:2446: he kṣitipa ! dhārttarāṣṭrasya yannāma bravīṣi adhunā tadeva śeṣamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2450: yathā śākuntale--rājā ārye ! atha sā tatrabhavatī kimākhyasya rājarṣeḥ patnī ? /
GK16visa06cu:2456: parivādeti parivādenārthena kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ parivādārthakaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2457_1: paścāttāṃ smṛtvā tāmanāsādya virahiṇaḥ svargādāgacchatastāpasīmukhāt tatprasaṅgaṃ
GK16visa06cu:2462: yathā veṇyām--“kṛṣṇaḥ--ete bhagavanto vyāsa--vālmīkiprabhṛtayo 'bhiṣekaṃ dhārayantastiṣṭhanti” iti /
GK16visa06cu:2474: yathā tatraiva---“draupadī---visumaridaṃ edaṃ vāvāraṃ ṇādhassa pasādeṇa puṇo vi sikkhissaṃ” /
GK16visa06cu:2479: vismṛtamimaṃ vyāpāraṃ nāthasya prasādena punarapi śikṣiṣye iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:2489: iyaṃ sāgarikāyāḥ mātulakanyakātvena paricaye sati vāsavadattāyā uktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2493: yathā mama prabhāvatyāṃ nāradadarśanāt pradyumna ūrddhvamavalokya---
GK16visa06cu:2495: digantaṃ jyotibhistuhinakaragaurairdhavalayannitaḥ kailāsādriḥ patati viyataḥ kiṃ punaridam //
GK16visa06cu:2502: tathā ca kailāsādrerapeto viyato viyato 'vadheḥ patati kaścit padārtha iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2506: mālāṃ kīdṛśī ? parimalena tata ito bhramantīnāṃ bhṛṅgaśreṇīnāṃ dhvanibhirupagītām /
GK16visa06cu:2529: bhānumatī duryyodhanasya patnī tathā dāsīdvārā prāk kaṭūktiḥ kṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:2544_0: rājānaḥ sutanirviśeṣamadhunā paśyantu nityaṃ prajā jīyasuḥ sadasadvivekapaṭavaḥ santo
GK16visa06cu:2544_1: guṇagrāhiṇaḥ sasyasvarṇasamṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu kṣamāmaṇḍale bhūyādavyabhicāriṇī
GK16visa06cu:2551: adhunā sutanirviśeṣaṃ yathā syāt tathā rājānaḥ prajāḥ paśyantu /
GK16visa06cu:2552: guṇagrāhiṇaḥ santaḥ śiṣṭā jīyāsuḥ utkarṣabhājo bhavantu, yataste sadasadvivekapaṭavaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2553: kṣamāmaṇḍale śasyānāṃ suvarṇānāñca samṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu /
GK16visa06cu:2554: nārāyaṇe cāvyabhicāriṇī akādācitkī bhaktiḥ trijagatāṃ bhūyāditi nṛpadeśādiśāntiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2558: “iha ca mukhasaṃdhau upakṣepaparinyāsayuktyudbhedasamādhānānāṃ pratimukhe ca parisarpaṇapragamanavajropanyāsapuṣpāṇāṃ garbhe 'bhūtāharaṇamargatro (to)
GK16visa06cu:2560: anyeṣāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ sthitiḥ” iti kecit /
GK16visa06cu:2563: (vi, ya) sandhiṣu yānyaṅgānyuktāni teṣu katicit aṅgānyeva āvaśyakatvena pradhānānīti kecidāhuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2582: rasānuguṇānurodhena tu ekasandheraṅgani anyasandhāvapi kuryyādityāha---kuryyādaniyate iti /
GK16visa06cu:2583: aniyate sandhavapi tasyāṅgasya niveśanaṃ kuryyāt ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2604: prakāśyānāmarthānāṃ prakāśanañceti prayogasya mukhasandhyādiprayogasya aṅgānāmupakṣepādyaṅgānāṃ ṣaṭ phalānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2605: yathā kāvyārthetpattirūpasya upakṣeparūpasya mukhasandhyaṅgasya iṣṭānusaraṇaṃ phalam /
GK16visa06cu:2609: yadvastu gopayitumiṣṭaṃ tadaṅgasvarūpavijñāpanena sukhena gopayitu evaṃ prakāśyānāṃ prakāśaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2612: aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogāya yujyate // VisSd_6.118 //
GK16visa06cu:2624: atra ca tatsambandhāt nāyakasahāya eva tattvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2634: upakṣepādyaṅgatrayasya ca pradhānanāyaketareṇa samuddiṣṭatve eva sādhutā ityāha--kintūpakṣepeti /
GK16visa06cu:2637: pradhānapuruṣasya dhīrodāttatvena karttavyetivṛttabījasamuddeśasya alpasyāpi tena karaṇānaucityād iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2638: tathā hi kāvyārthasya samutpattirūpaṃ yadupakṣeparūpamaṅgaṃ tena veṇyāṃ lākṣāgṛhānaletyādi bhīmoktyā kurukulavadharūpakāvyārthasya tasya bījasamutpattiḥ pratipāditā /
GK16visa06cu:2646: bījoddeśamātrādeva nāyakasya dhīrodāttatvabhaṅga ityatra eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa06cu:2650: tathā ca yadveṇyāṃ duryodhanasya bhānumatyā saha vipralambho darśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:2657: kintu rasavyañjanāpekṣayā eva eṣāṃ niveśanaṃ na tu nāṭyasāstroktasthitisampādanecchayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2658: yadyapīdaṃ prāgapyuktaṃ tathāpi rasavyaktyanapekṣayā karaṇe doṣa tvapratipādanāya purarūktam /
GK16visa06cu:2672: svasyopakrāntavṛttasya viruddhamadhikaṃ yad vṛttaṃ vṛttāntaḥ tadapi rasābhivyaktaye 'nyathayedupakrāntarasāviruddhatayā pratipādayet /
GK16visa06cu:2677: rase raudre ca bībhatse vṛttiḥ sarvatra bhāratī // VisSd_6.122 //
GK16visa06cu:2684: nāyakādīnāṃ vyāpāraviśeṣāścatastro vṛttayo nāṭakādiṣu nāṭakaprakaraṇādidaśarūpakeṣu nāṭikādyaṣṭādaśoparūpakeṣu ca sarvanāṭyasya mātṛkā mūlabhūtāḥ jananya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2696: kāmena madanena hetunā ya upabhogaḥ sambhogastatkāraṇāni upacārāścandracandanaghanasārādayo yasyām /
GK16visa06cu:2721: śuddhena saśṛṅgāreṇa samayena ca hāsyena vihitamiti traividhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2725: esā vi avarā tava samīve jadhālihidā edaṃ kiṃ ajjavasantassa viṇṇāṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2729: eṣāpyaparā tava samīpe yā ālikhitā etat kimāryavasantakasya vijñānam ? (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2730: citraphalake sāgarikayā likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṅgatayā tatsamīpe sāgarikāpi likhitā /
GK16visa06cu:2731: tatra likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattayā pṛṣṭaṃ kena tvamatra likhitā iti /
GK16visa06cu:2733: tatastadantike sāgarikāṃ likhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā “eṣā krodhena tasyāḥ śṛṅgārābhāvāt /
GK16visa06cu:2736: saśṛṅgārahāsyena yathā śākuntale--rājānaṃ prati śakuntalā--asaṃtuṭṭho uṇa kiṃ karissadi /
GK16visa06cu:2744: nanu kamalasya madhukaraḥ santuṣyati gandhamātreṇa iti rājña uktyanantaraṃ śakuntalāyā iyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa06cu:2748: sabhayahāsyena yathā ratnāvalyām---ālekhyadarśanāvasare susaṃgatā--jāṇido mae eso vuttanto samaṃ cittaphalaeṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2757: atra rājño bhītiyuktena susaṅgatāyā hāsena vihitaṃ narma vaidaghdhyakrīḍitam /
GK16visa06cu:2763: tatra sāgarikāyāḥ saṅketabhaṅgārthaṃ tadveśāyā vāsavadattāyā āgamane veśena bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2768: visṛja sundari ! saṅgamasādhvasaṃ nanu cirātprabhṛti praṇayonmukhe /
GK16visa06cu:2770: mālavikā--“bhaṭṭā, devīe bhaeṇa appaṇo vi pia kauṃ ṇa pāremi” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2779: nanu bhościrāt praṇayonmukhe mayi atimuktalatāyāḥ mādhavīlatāyāścaritaṃ gṛhāṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2780: mayi kīdṛśe ? sahakāratāṃ cūtavṛkṣatāṃ gate, mādhavikayā cūtāliṅganāt, tadvat māmāliṅgetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2782: he bharttaḥ ! devyāḥ bhayena ātmano 'pi priyaṃ karttuṃ na pārayāmi (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2789: gamanamalasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kintvetat syāt kimadanyadito 'thavā /
GK16visa06cu:2790: bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām //
GK16visa06cu:2797: alasagamanādikam etat kinnu tasyāḥ, nanu bhoḥ kiṃ syāt ito 'nyat, atha vā kiyatsyādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2801: atrottarottarādhikādhikasambhāvanāyāṃ pūrvoktaiḥ sūcitasya bhāvasya leśa evetyāha---alasetyādi /
GK16visa06cu:2815: pitrā rājājñayā jarate nandanāya dātuṃ kṛtaniścayā mālatīti devatagṛhe svamaraṇaṃ prārthayantī lavaṅgikāyāḥ pāde patitā mālatī /
GK16visa06cu:2816: stambhantaritasthito mādhavaśca lavaṅgikāveśena āgatya lavaṅgikām apasārya tatsthāne svapādaṃ dattvā sthitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2817: tato mālatī utthāyā lavaṅgikābuddhyā tamāliṅgya paścād dṛṣṭvā paricīyamānā vyavasāyat nivavṛte ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2827: sattvādibhiḥ samastavyastālpatarair bahulā tadvaiśiṣṭyāt bāhulyavatī harṣādyanyatarayuktā vṛttiśca sāttvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2830: atra kṣudraśṛṅgāratvena strīsaṃkulatvakāmopabogarāhityena vīrarasatvena kauśikīto viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2839: ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo 'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyantu mamāpi samprati kutastvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2840: tvatsāṅgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastat kiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛtaiḥ ?
GK16visa06cu:2844: (vi, ṭha) ānandāya ceti---paraśurāmāgame rāmaṃ prati janakasya vākyamidam /
GK16visa06cu:2848: ato 'dya tvaddarśane samprati etat kṣaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ kuto vaitṛṣṇayam /
GK16visa06cu:2849: utkaṇṭhābāhulyāt kṣaṇāntare 'niṣṭanivṛttau tu utkaṇṭhānivṛttyā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ syāditi samprati padabhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2850: bahuvyāhṛtairvā kiṃ, yato vaivāhikamāṅgalyasukhasya na viṣayo 'smi /
GK16visa06cu:2851: ato 'smin viṃsmṛtasya jāmadagnyasya vijayanimittaṃ tava bāhau dhanurjṛmbhatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2853: atra vismayavaśād rāmaśauryyeṇānandādinā ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2856: mantraśaktyā yathā---mudrārākṣase rākṣasasāyānāṃ cāṇakyena svabuddhyā bhedanam /
GK16visa06cu:2862: mantrasya mantraṇārthasya dhanasya daivasyādṛṣṭasya vā śakteḥ śaktihetoḥ saṃghasya sainyasamūhasya bhedanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2863: rākṣasaḥ śatrumantrī; cāṇakyo rājamantrī; svabuddhyā svamantraṇayā /
GK16visa06cu:2864: atra cāṇakyasya sattvadānānekasattvaṃ saṃghabhedanavaśād vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2868: yaḥ kila saparivārakārttikeyavijayāvajītena bhagavatā nīlalohite parivatsarasahastrāntevāsine tubhyaṃ prasādīkṛtaḥ paraśuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2869: paraśurāmaḥ--rāma dāśarathe ! sa evāyamāryapādānāṃ priyaḥ paraśuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2876: atra kautukeneva vijayo na tu vāstava iti tatpitṛprasādagamyam /
GK16visa06cu:2877: tathāparaprasādalabdhena paraśunā ko 'yaṃ garva iti rāmasya gabhīrātmikā uktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2878: paraśurāmoktau tatpriyavastvapi mahyaṃ dattamiti svamahattvakhyāpanameva gabhīratā /
GK16visa06cu:2908: jīyante jayino 'pi sāndratimiravrātairviyadvyāpibhir- bhāsvantaḥ sakalā raverapi karāḥ kasmādakasmādamī /
GK16visa06cu:2916: raverapi amī bhāsvantaḥ sakalāḥ karāḥ akasmādakāle kasmādacchādyante /
GK16visa06cu:2918: ānanarūpābhyaḥ kandarābhyo 'nalamuca ete pheravāḥ śṛgālāśca tīvrān ravān muñcantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2929: kruddhau ca tau satvarau ceti karmadhārayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2942: neturnṛtyapātrasya ekasya nivṛttau netrantarasya graha eva saṃkṣiptavasturacanā /
GK16visa06cu:2951: eva sugrīvakilañjahastinoḥ pūrvaṃ raudro raso bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2977: aśrāvya khalu yadvastu tadiha svagataṃ matam // VisSd_6.137 //
GK16visa06cu:2979: rahasyaṃ tu yadanyasya parāvṛtya prakāśyate // VisSd_6.138 //
GK16visa06cu:2990: tādṛśena kareṇānyamapavāryyācchādya janasyānte antike yat anyonyāmantraṇaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa06cu:2993: kiṃ vravīṣīti yannāṭye vinā pātraṃ prayujyate /
GK16visa06cu:2995: yaḥ kaścidartho yasmādropanīyastasyāntarata ūrdhvaṃ sarvāṅgulināmitānāmikaṃ tripatākalakṣaṇaṃ karaṃ kṛtvānyena saha yanmantryate tajjanāntikam /
GK16visa06cu:3009: dattāṃ siddhāṃ ca senāṃ ca veśyānāṃ nāma darśayet /
GK16visa06cu:3015: vasantādiṣu varṇanīyasya vastuno yannāma bhavet ceṭaceṭyostathā nāma ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3025: nāṭake garbhitaḥ pratipādyo yor'thastatprakāśakaṃ nāṭakasya nāma kāryyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3041: (vi, ra) nāṭikādīnyaṣṭādaśoparūpakāṇi yānyuktani teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma kābhirnāyikānāmnaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3049: tadantaḥ sādhadhātuḥ gameḥ sthāne prāyeṇa prayujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3053: rājā svamīti deveti bhṛtyairbhaṭṭeti cādhamaiḥ // VisSd_6.144 //
GK16visa06cu:3063: (lo, ū) apatyapratyayena yathā--he rāghava ! he dāśarathe ! ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:3069: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājannati apatyapratyayena ca vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3074: vayasyetyathavā nāmnā vācyo rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.146 //
GK16visa06cu:3079: vidūṣako rājñā vayasyeti vācyaḥ, athavā nāmnaiva iti /
GK16visa06cu:3086: sūtradhāraṃ vadedbhāva iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //

GK16visa06cu:3366_0: atra draupadyāḥ keśāsaṃyamanahetau bhānumatyā pṛṣṭe sabhrātṛkaduryodhanavadhābhāve
GK16visa06cu:3366_1: hetau pradarśayitavye vaidhavyacihnasya bhānumatyāḥ keśamocanasya abhāvo hetuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa pradarśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:3372: kiṃ cāsya viṣayasyaiva devatā kimu pārvatī //

GK16visa06cu:3446: yathā mama prabhāvatyām--“anena khalu sarvataścaratā cañcarīkeṇāvaśyaṃ viditā bhaviṣyati priyatamā me prabhāvatī” /
GK16visa06cu:3475: āryye tvayibhīme jyotiḥ krodhajanitaṃ svatejaḥ sambhṛtamāviṣkṛtam /

GK16visa06cu:3496: vāmā upadiṣṭe tad viparītakāriṇyaḥ kulasyādhayo manasaḥ vyathākāriṇyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3503: jai saṃharijjai tamo dheppai saalehi te pāo /

GK16visa06cu:3882: aparikṣatakomalo 'yamadharaścāruṇi sphuritena mama pānānujñāṃ dadātīva ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa06cu:3911: pūrvāddhoktarūpāṃ priyāṃ jīvantīṃ yadicchasi tadā māmāsubhirātmānaṃ rakṣa /

GK16visa06cu:3957: tāpasāviti rājño mṛgahananaṃ nirvāryya samidāharaṇāya ityucaturityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3961: iha cāsmadguroḥ kaṇvasya kulapateḥ sādhidaivata iva śakuntalayānumālinītīramāśramo dṛśyate /

GK16visa06cu:3971: indrajit ityādikam indrajitaṃ saṃbodhya lakṣmaṇasya paruṣavākyamidam /
GK16visa06cu:3976: yathā sundarāṅke--“duryodhanaḥ dhig dhik sūta ! kiṃ kṛtavānasi /
GK16visa06cu:3977: vatsasya me prakṛtidurlalitasya pāpaḥ pāpaṃ vidhāsyati--” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:3982: vatsasya karṇaputrasya vṛṣasenasya pāpaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ pāpaṃ vadham /
GK16visa06cu:3995: yathā śākuntale rājānaṃ prati “śārṅgaravaḥ--āḥ kathamidaṃ nāma, kimupanyastamiti ?
GK16visa06cu:3998: ataḥ samīpe pariṇeturiṣyate priyāpriyā vā pramadā svabandhubhiḥ //
GK16visa06cu:4005: śakuntalāṃ svīkarttuṃ bahuśaḥ śārṅgaraveṇokte rājñoktaṃ kimidamupanyastamiti /

GK16visa06cu:4028: yathā veṇyām--kṛpaṃ prati “aśvatthāmā---tvamapi tāvadrājñaḥ pāśarvavarto bhava /
GK16visa06cu:4037: (lo, ā) sa eva yo bhāṣitaḥ sa evābhimāna eva /
GK16visa06cu:4039: yathā tatraiva---“duryodhanaḥ---mātaḥ kimapyasadṛśaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vacaste---” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:4043: vākyāt yo 'bhimānaḥ pratīyate sa evābhimānākhyālaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa06cu:4045: pāṇḍavebhyo rājyaṃ dātuṃ gāndhāryā ukte duryodhanasyābhimānamūleyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4049: yathā śākuntale--“rājā---(śakuntalāṃ prati) ayi ! tapo vardhate /
GK16visa06cu:4061: atrāsītphaṇipāśabandhanavidhiḥ śaktyā bhavaddevare gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi tāḍite hanumatā droṇādriratrāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4067: na ca pūrvasiddhārthakathanātmakaṃ yat niruktirūpaṃ nāṭyalakṣaṇamuktaṃ tadbheda iti vācyam /
GK16visa06cu:4068: tatra svakṛtirūpasya pūrvasiddhārthasya nihatāśeṣakauravya ityādinā kathanamatra tu svaparasādhāraṇakṛtapūrvavṛttasya iti tadbhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4069: atra āsīditi puṣpakeṇāgamane raṇasthalaṃ sītāṃ darśayato rāmasya vākyamidam /
GK16visa06cu:4070: bhavaddevare lakṣmaṇe vakṣasi rāvaṇena śaktyā gāḍhaṃ tāḍite sati droṇādriḥ gandhamāhanādriḥ atra hanumatā āhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4073: he mṛgākṣi ! rākṣasapateḥ rāvaṇasya kaṇṭhāṭavī kenāpyatra kṛttā arthāt mayā /
GK16visa06cu:4075: yācñā tu kvāpi yācñā yā svayaṃ dūtamukhena vā // VisSd_6.209 //
GK16visa06cu:4081: dūtamukhena vā ityukteḥ dūtamukhena yācanocitavastuyācñā labhyate /
GK16visa06cu:4082: tena tat paśyeyamanaṅgamaṅgalagṛhamityādau udāharaṇake āśaṃsanākhyālaṅkāreṇaiva bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4089: tatkṣamasva vibho ! kiṃ ca sugrīvaste samarpitaḥ //
GK16visa06cu:4106: yathā veṇyām---“rājā---kañcukin ! devasya devakīnandanasya bahumānādvatsasya bhīmasenasya vijayamaṅgalāya pravartantāṃ tatrocitāḥ samārambhāḥ” /
GK16visa06cu:4112: kāryasya sambandhai yat sādhuno maṅgalasya pravarttanaṃ tat ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4114: tena bhūtakāryyākhyānarūpāt utkīrttanālaṅkārāt bhedaḥ deśaḥ so 'yamityādi /
GK16visa06cu:4119: yadi samaramapāsya nāsti mṛtyorbhayamiti yuktamito 'nyataḥ prayātum /
GK16visa06cu:4120: akha maraṇamavaśyameva jantoḥ kimiti mudhā malinaṃ yaśaḥ kurudhvam ? //
GK16visa06cu:4126: droṇasya maraṇena palāyamānān vīrān prati aśvatthāmna uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:4137: ṇa juttaṃ assamavāsiṇo jaṇassa akidasakkāraṃ adidhivisesaṃ ujjhia sacchandado gamaṇam” /
GK16visa06cu:4142: sakhi ! na yuktamāśramavāsino janasyākṛtasatkāramatithiviśeṣamuktvā svacchandato gamanam /
GK16visa06cu:4144: eṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇanāṭyālaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyata ekarūpatve 'pi bhedena vyapadeśo gaḍḍalikāpravāheṇa /
GK16visa06cu:4152: etāni lakṣaṇāni, etā alaṅkṛtaya ityevaṃ bhedena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4156: gaḍḍarikāpravāheṇeti---yathā gaḍḍarikā ekā aparāṃ tāṃ caṃtarānugacchati,
GK16visa06cu:4157: tāsāṃ gatānugatamātreṇa bhedaḥ tathā lakṣaṇanāṭyālaṅkārayorapīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4163: keṣāñcit vakṣyamāṇopamāvyatirekālaṅkārādirūpatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu keṣāñcicca guṇabhāvatatsamvandhivyañjakatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu antarbhāvasambhave 'pi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4164: prayatnataḥ karttavyatvāditi---karttavyatā ca tattaprasaṅgaucityānusāreṇa yathāyogyameva na tu sarvatraiva sarveṣābhityavadheyam /
GK16visa06cu:4181: sukavinā tu etat sakalaviśiṣṭamapi naṭakaṃ karttyamiti munināṃktatvāt tena sarvabhidaṃ karttavyamityāha---pañcasandhi caturvṛttītyādi kuryāttu nāṭakamityantam /
GK16visa06cu:4187_0: ityuktatvāt trayastriṃśadalaṅkāroktyanantaraṃ vīthyaṅgānāṃ vaktavyatve prāpte vīthirūpakanāṭakaviśeṣasya
GK16visa06cu:4187_1: viśipya darśitatvāt darśayiṣyamāṇatadavasare vīthyaṅgāni vakṣyante ityāha---vīthyaṅgānīti /
GK16visa06cu:4211: tantrībhāṇḍam tantryāśrayāṃ vīṇāṃ puraskṛtya pradhānīkṛtya śuṣkaṃ gānaṃ nṛtyahīnagānam /
GK16visa06cu:4215: madanottāpitā yatra paṭhati prākṛtaṃ sthitā // VisSd_6.215 //
GK16visa06cu:4233: (lo, ū) viparyāsaceṣṭitaṃ striyāḥ puruṣasya coṣṭitaṃ, paruṣasya strīceṣṭitam /
GK16visa06cu:4236: vīṇāpuraḥsaraṃ gānaṃ striyāḥ pracchedako mataḥ // VisSd_6.218 //
GK16visa06cu:4252: prākṛtaṃ vacanaṃ vaktiṃ yatra tatsaindhavaṃ matam /
GK16visa06cu:4295: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ naṭakalakṣaṇaṃ gobalīvardanyāyena bhinnaṃ mahānāṭakalakṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:4306: laukikaṃ na tu divyaṃ miśraṃ vā /
GK16visa06cu:4314: nāṭakaprakaraṇabhāṇādayo ye rūpakoparūpakaprabhedā utkīrttitā “vinā viśeṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ lakṣma nāṭakavanmatam” /
GK16visa06cu:4319: śṛṅgāritvena kadāciddharmasya nāyikāyā mānāt kadācitkāmasya kāmārthavyavasāyāt arthasya cāpāyavānityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4325: nāyikā kulajā kvāpi veśyā kvāpi dvayaṃ kvacit /
GK16visa06cu:4331: tasya prakaraṇasya kulajā veśyā tadubhayanāyikābhedāt bhedakṣatrayam /
GK16visa06cu:4340: ekāṅka eka evātra nipuṇaḥ paṇḍito viṭaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4345: mukhanivahaṇo sandhī lāsyāṅgāni daśāpi ca // VisSd_6.230 //
GK16visa06cu:4350: nāṭakasyāntarātmā nāyakaḥ sa nānāvastho yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4423: sa cācetanaiḥ kāṣṭhaputtalikādibhiścetanaiḥ prahasanakaraiścetanācetanaiścetanatve 'pi prakṛṣṭacetanārahitaiḥ paśvādibhiḥ tadvakṣyati /
GK16visa06cu:4437: tatra nāyikānāyakayoḥ arthalābhārthaḥ śṛṅgāro veśyānāṃ; dharmāvirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ svadāreṣu puṃsaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4441: prahasano hāsyayuktaḥ prathamoddiṣṭo 'pi dharmaśṛṅgāraḥ paścād vidheyatvena paścād vyākhyātaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4442: aniyamāditi kvaciddivyaḥ kvacinnaro vā nāyakaḥ arthaprakṛtayaḥ ārambhayatnādyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4465: mukhapratimukhe sandhī tatra nirvahaṇaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.245 //
GK16visa06cu:4473: narau vā divyau vā naradivyau vā nāyakapratināyakāvityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4482: mahādhmāno vadhaprāptā api vadhyāḥ syuratra no /
GK16visa06cu:4488: tathā ca nāyakapratināyakau dvau, patākānāyakā daśa iti dvādhaśā /
GK16visa06cu:4489: yuddhamiti yuddharūpaṃ saṃrambhaṃ vikramaṃ parabalamānīya prāpayya vyājāt nivarttayet ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4494: ekāṅko deva evātra netetyāhuḥ pare punaḥ // VisSd_6.249 //
GK16visa06cu:4504: anye tu ṣaḍnāyakamāhurityāha--ekāṅko divya ityādi ca /
GK16visa06cu:4505: patākānāyaka ityādikaṃ vyācaṣṭai---patākāsthā iti nāyakapratināyakayoḥ sambandhinaḥ patākāsthā nāyakā militāḥ saṅgatā daśa ityarthaḥ īhāmṛgavyutpattimāha---nāyako mṛgavaditi /
GK16visa06cu:4508: utsṛṣṭikāṅka ekāṅko netāraḥ prākṛtā narāḥ // VisSd_6.250 //
GK16visa06cu:4512: yuddhaṃ ca vācā karttavyaṃ nirvadavacanaṃ bahu // VisSd_6.252 //
GK16visa06cu:4522: asya ca ekāṅkatvena aṅkāntarotsaṅkāt amum utsṛṣṭikāṅkanāmānaṃ kecidāhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4523: anye tu vakṣyamāṇavīthyāmapi ekāṅkasattvāt tasyā api utsṛṣṭikāṅkatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4536: arthaprakṛtaya iti bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryyameva iti yāḥ pañca prakṛtayaḥ prāguktāstā ākhilā api atretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4543: kauśikyā vṛtteratra anuktatve 'pi bhūriśṛṅgāravattvāt tallābha ityāha--śṛṅgārabahulatvāditi /
GK16visa06cu:4548: asatpralāpavyāhāramṛda(mārda) vāni ca tāni tu // VisSd_6.256 //
GK16visa06cu:4562: (vi, pa) prapañcākhyamaṅgamāha---mitha iti--asadbhūtam alīkārtham ata eva hāsyakṛt /
GK16visa06cu:4571: śrutisāmyataḥ śrūyamāṇaśabdadvayasāmyāt tayorvastuta ekārthatve 'pi anekārthayorekabhinnārthayoryojanaṃ pratyāyanamityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:4575: rāmā ramye vanānte 'smin mayā virahitā tvayā //
GK16visa06cu:4582: mayā virahitā sarvāṅgasundarī rāmā urvaśī ramye 'smin vanānte tvayā dṛṣṭā iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4583: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā ityāhatvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭeti pratiśabdārthasya yojanāddarśanottaraṇaśabdayorekārthatve 'pi darśitarītyā praśrottarabhāvena yojanādanekārthatā,
GK16visa06cu:4588: mayā virahitā tvayā dṛṣṭā; pakṣe tvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭā /
GK16visa06cu:4589: atra rājñāṃ prathamārthābhiprāyeṇa praśrarūpārthaṃ vākyamidamuktvā parvate pratidhvanimākarṇya dvitīyārthaḥ parvatasyottaratvenāvagato virahonmādāta /
GK16visa06cu:4595: kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ kvā'ste duryodhano 'sau kathayata,
GK16visa06cu:4603: dyūtacchalādikarttṛtvaviśiṣṭo yastaṃ draṣṭumāgatau svaḥ na tu ruṣā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4607: atra draṣṭumeva na ruṣeti priyābhena vākyena pratārya upahasanam /
GK16visa06cu:4624: kiṃ tena madyaṃ vinā madyaṃ cāpi tava priyaṃ priyamaho vārāṅganābhiḥ saha /
GK16visa06cu:4625: veśyāpyartharuciḥ kutastava dhanaṃ dyūtena cauryeṇa vā cauryadyūtaparigraho 'pi bhavato,
GK16visa06cu:4630: parihāsāya māṃsaṃ bhakṣantaṃ bhikṣuṃ prati bhikṣo ityādirgṛhiṇaḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4659: adya mama pracaṇḍe bhujadaṇḍe samarpito ya uruḥ kodaṇḍastato nirgalitānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ bāṇaānāṃ samūhasya (sahastrasya vā pāṭhabhedāt )
GK16visa06cu:4660: pātairiyaṃ kṣauṇī kṣaṇena samastadaityakṣatajaiḥ ukṣitā satī piśitāśanānāṃ lobhanīya āstāmityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4662: gaṇḍaṃ prastutasaṃbandhi bhinnārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.260 //
GK16visa06cu:4664: adhyāsituṃ tava cirājjaghanasthalasya paryāptameva karabhoru ! mamorugmam //
GK16visa06cu:4670: satvareṇoktatvāt satvaraṃ bhinnārthaṃ vaco yat prastutasya prakrāntasya varṇanaṃ tat sambandhitayā pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4679: yathā chilitarāme--sītā-jāda ! kāllaṃ kkhu aojjhāeṇa gantavvam, tarhi so rāā viṇaeṇa paṇayidavvo /
GK16visa06cu:4683: sītā--(sāśaṅkam) mā aṇṇadhā saṅkaddham, ṇa kkhu tumhāṇaṃ saalāe jjeva puhavīetti /
GK16visa06cu:4687: svarasoktasya vaktṛbhāvena utkasya śroturasvarasāt yadanyathā vyākhyānaṃ tadavasyanditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4690: tatra sa rājā vinayena praṇamitavyaḥ (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4692: jātaḥ sa khalu yuvayoḥ pitā (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4695: mā aṇṇadhā iti, mā anyathā śaṅkethām /
GK16visa06cu:4696: na khalu yuvayoḥ kiṃ tu sakalāyā eva pṛthivyā iti (iti saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:4698: atrapiteti janakaparatayā sītayā svarasoktasya labdhāvasyandanāt tayā eva pālakatayā vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4700: prahelikaiva hāsyena yuktā bhavati nālikā // VisSd_6.261 //
GK16visa06cu:4702: yathā ratnāvalyām---susaṅgatā---sahi jassa kide tumaṃ āadā so ida jjeva ciṭṭhadi /
GK16visa06cu:4703: sāgarikā--kassa kide ahaṃ āadā susaṅgatā--ṇaṃ kkhu cittaphalaassa /
GK16visa06cu:4704: atra tvaṃ rājñaḥ kṛte āgatetyarthaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4708: saṃvaraṇakārīti vyākhyānarūpāṅge 'pi saṃvaraṇarūpasya sattve 'pyatra hāsyayuktatvaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4709: sahi jasseti---sakhi yasya kṛte tvamāgatā so 'traiva tiṣṭhatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4711: kasya kṛte ahamāgatā (iti saṃskṛtam) ṇaṃ citteti /
GK16visa06cu:4715: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yacca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //
GK16visa06cu:4734: alikulam eva mañjulāḥ keśaā yasyāstādṛśī, kisalayameva peśalapāṇiryasyāstādṛśī /
GK16visa06cu:4739: atra ca āhāryāropābhāvāt na rūpakaṃ kintu vāstavabhramāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa06cu:4741: tatra yathā mama-- dvijaḥ śākhāyuktastvayi kṛtakathaḥ kokila iti tvayākhyeyaṃ mande mayi virahipāte kiyadagham /
GK16visa06cu:4742: iti praśre vāyormukulapulakā cūtalatikā dhruvaṃ dhṛtvā mauliṃ na khalu kiyadityuttarayati //
GK16visa06cu:4743: atra hi vātadhūtamaulikāyāṃ cūtalatikāyāṃ mandavayoḥ kati māpapraśre maulipūnanena pāpabhāvottarāropaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4747: kokila eva drupadāmantrasya ṛṣiḥ kokilanāma vedaśākhāyukto dvijaḥ sa tvayi kṛtakatha ityatastvayā mande vedarahite idamapyākhyeyam /
GK16visa06cu:4751: tṛtīyaṃ yathā veṇyāṃ duryodhanaṃ prati gāndhāryā hitavākyam /
GK16visa06cu:4752: athavā pradīyatāṃ dāśarathaye maithilīti rāvaṇaṃ prati vibhīṣaṇasya vākyamidamapi bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:4757: (ityupakrameṇa) gaṇadāsaḥ--(vidūṣakaṃ prati---) ārya ! ucyatāṃ yastvayā kramabhedo lakṣitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4758: vidūṣakaḥ--paḍhamaṃ bambhaṇapūā bhodi, sā imāe laṅghidā /
GK16visa06cu:4760: ityādinā nāyakasya viśuddhanāyikādarśanaprayuktena hāsalobhakāriṇa vacasā vyāhāraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4770: prathamaṃ brāhmaṇapūjā bhavati sā anayā laṅghitā /
GK16visa06cu:4772: atra parasya lājño lābhārthaṃ hāsyakaraṃ vidūṣakasya vākyamāha--
GK16visa06cu:4774: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syurmṛdar(mādaṃ)vaṃ hi tat // VisSd_6.263 //
GK16visa06cu:4780: etāni cāṅgani nāṭakādiṣu sambhavantyapi vīthyāmavaśyaṃ vidheyāni spaṣṭatayā nāṭakādiṣu viniviṣṭānyapīhodāhṛtāni /
GK16visa06cu:4787: aṅgī hāsyarasastatra vīthyaṅgānāṃ sthitirna vā // VisSd_6.265 //
GK16visa06cu:4792: āśritya kañcana janaṃ saṃkīrṇamiti tadviduḥ // VisSd_6.266 //
GK16visa06cu:4803: idaṃ tu saṅkīrṇenaiva gatārthamiti muninā pṛthaṅnoktam /
GK16visa06cu:4805: tatra nāṭikā kḷptavṛttā syāt strīprāyā caturaṅkikā /
GK16visa06cu:4811: pade pade mānavatī tadvaśaḥ saṅgamo dvayoḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4812: vṛttiḥ syātkauśikī svalpavimarśāḥ sandhayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.272 //
GK16visa06cu:4817: troṭakaṃ nāma tatprāhuḥ pratyaṅkaṃ savidūṣakam // VisSd_6.273 //
GK16visa06cu:4829: na ca viṣkambhako 'pyatra pracuraścādbhuto rasaḥ // VisSd_6.276 //
GK16visa06cu:4847: dāsī ca nāyikā vṛttiḥ kauśikī bhāratī tathā // VisSd_6.280 //
GK16visa06cu:4855: catastro nāyikāstatra trayo 'ṅkā iti kecana // VisSd_6.283 //
GK16visa06cu:4867: netā strī cāpyudāttātra sandhī ādyo tathāntimaḥ // VisSd_6.285 //
GK16visa06cu:4877: nepathye gīyate nāndī tathā tatra prarocanā // VisSd_6.287 //
GK16visa06cu:4886: hīnairbhāṣyā vibhāṣā syāt sā ca saptavidhā smṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:4887: prācyāvantī māgadhī ca śākārī ca tathāparā /
GK16visa06cu:4888: cāṇḍālī śāvarī caiva tathā bhīrīti bhedataḥ //
GK16visa06cu:4899: na tatra vṛttirbhavati bhāratī na ca kauśikī // VisSd_6.292 //
GK16visa06cu:4920: aśāntahāsyāśca rasā nāyako brāhmaṇo mataḥ // VisSd_6.296 //
GK16visa06cu:4942: svalpavṛttā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //
GK16visa06cu:4980: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4993: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso vibodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //
GK16visa06cu:4997: bhrāntināśo vibodhaḥ syānmithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //
GK16visa06cu:5003: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāṭakaprakṛtitve 'pi yathaicityaṃ yathālābhaṃ nāṭakoktaviśeṣaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5004: yatra ca nāṭakoktasyāpi punarupādānaṃ tatra tatsadbhāvasya niyamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5020: taduktavastuno yacca punarupādānaṃ nāṭakāntara iti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:5032: dvābhyāṃ tu yugmakaṃ sāṃdānatikaṃ tribhiriṣyate // VisSd_6.314 //
GK16visa06cu:5039: “sāndrānandamanantamavyayamajaṃ yadyogino 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkartumupāsate prati muhurdhyānaikatānāḥ param /
GK16visa06cu:5045_0: sāndrānandamiti--yatparaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ brahma kṣaṇamapi sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā dhyānamātrāviṣṭā
GK16visa06cu:5045_1: yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5054: (vi, ṭha) māninyā mānabhaṅgaprakāraṃ sakhyau kathayannāha--kiṃ karoṣītyādi /
GK16visa06cu:5055: he kānte ! karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ? tataḥ praṇayapravaṇa ityādi spaṣṭam /
GK16visa06cu:5056: kuraṅgākṣīmiti vaktuṃ vayaṃ yāvadīhāmahe tāvanmadhuro madhupadhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt /
GK16visa06cu:5057: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
GK16visa06cu:5064: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
GK16visa06cu:5066: ekavaṃśabhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
GK16visa06cu:5068: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭakasandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
GK16visa06cu:5078: catvārastasya vargāḥ syusteṣvekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
GK16visa06cu:5080: kvacinnindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
GK16visa06cu:5082: nāstisvalpā nātidīrghāḥ sargā aṣṭādhikā iha // VisSd_6.320 //
GK16visa06cu:5084: sargānte bhāvisargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.321 //
GK16visa06cu:5090: kavervṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasyetarasya vā // VisSd_6.324 //
GK16visa06cu:5094: (vi, ṇa) catvāra iti---dharmārthakāmamokṣā ye catvāro vargāsteṣvekamapi tatphalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5097: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5108: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5116: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
GK16visa06cu:5131: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5172: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //
GK16visa06cu:5192: cūrṇakaṃ yathā bhama--“guṇaratnasāgara ! jagadekanāgara ! kāminīmadana ! janarañjana !” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:5196: samarakaṇḍuleti--samarotsāhena kaṇḍule nibiḍe dṛḍhe bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ yena /
GK16visa06cu:5202: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt,
GK16visa06cu:5204: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
GK16visa06cu:5206: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
GK16visa06cu:5218: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
GK16visa06cu:5230: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5234: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” ityāhuḥ, tadayuktam /
GK16visa06cu:5242: “ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad “āpitu“--ityādidaṇḍyācāryavacanādayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5271: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
